reviews.review_msg: Valia knows her subject very well both theoretically and practically. She has a lot of experience in the field and is a very knowledgeable instructor.

Valia pretends she knows about teaching in public schools while she has obviously never taught in the public system. She knows absolutely nothing about pedagogy, or practical applications of the content of her classes. She is a classic north american professor who pretends to care but doesn't really.
